name: Tsuridou: Keiryuu Mizuumi-hen
overview: Tsuridou Keiryuu Mizuumihen is a fishing game with different modes: - Story mode: The player can choose between a male or a female character, can also choose the name of the character, and after that he can compete in different tournaments, go to different river fishing spots, go to the shop to buy new lures, rods, etc; The game features a complete fish database, etc. - Free Fishing: Choose a place and go around in a free fishing mode. - Japan Rivers Database: A complete database explaining all the rivers routes.
